resources.string: Welcome to GeniPass, the password manager that generates your passwords on-the-fly without storing them.
Below is your password, the spaces are provided for easy read; it is up to you if you want to include them in your password, JUST BE CONSISITENT!
Enter a password below to test its strength as a password.

Enter the service and tag below. 

Service: name of service of the password you want. 
Tag: Optional text for multiple passwords per service.
